

.. _file_necsim_SimulatedSpeciesAbundancesHandler.h:

File SimulatedSpeciesAbundancesHandler.h
========================================



Class for repeatedly selecting random species from a distribution of species abundances. 


.. contents:: Contents
   :local:
   :backlinks: none
